all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And let every man deal honestly, and be alike among this people, and receive alike, that ye may be one, even as I have commanded you.
Doctrine and Covenants 51:9
Quote of the Day
"Our testimony will be tested and tried. Faith is not faith if never tested. Faith is not strong if never opposed."
Dieter F. Uchtdorf | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
